Livin Epistlez

Saturday, March 21
7:00PM - 7:10PM

PromiseLand Church
1504 E 51st St

Tweet

Listen to Still Believing

Living Epistlez Bio

Always high energy when onstage captivating audiences with riveting performances, Livin Epistlez give a unique approach to hip hop and ministry. With a strong appreciation for the anointing of God, L.E. uses every opportunity to pour their heart out to others as a dying man would to dying people. Witty and bold lyrics get audiences involved bobbing heads and clapping hands but their capitalizing moment is when those same people get brought to the sobering point of decision in their life to accept the Lord Jesus Christ as Savior. Committed to making disciples and living out the word of God their lives truly demonstrate the meaning of a living epistle.

The group Living Epistlez consist of two cousins, Pastor/Rapper Jason Niesing and Justin Meise aka Just’Flo residents of Dallas, TX. The family duo originally from Sheboygan, WI came to Texas to get a fresh start from a crime and drug filled past. Bot...

Living Epistlez Bio

Always high energy when onstage captivating audiences with riveting performances, Livin Epistlez give a unique approach to hip hop and ministry. With a strong appreciation for the anointing of God, L.E. uses every opportunity to pour their heart out to others as a dying man would to dying people. Witty and bold lyrics get audiences involved bobbing heads and clapping hands but their capitalizing moment is when those same people get brought to the sobering point of decision in their life to accept the Lord Jesus Christ as Savior. Committed to making disciples and living out the word of God their lives truly demonstrate the meaning of a living epistle.

The group Living Epistlez consist of two cousins, Pastor/Rapper Jason Niesing and Justin Meise aka Just’Flo residents of Dallas, TX. The family duo originally from Sheboygan, WI came to Texas to get a fresh start from a crime and drug filled past. Both were raised in homes that sin was visible, accepted and God was absent. Jason first heard about Jesus at sixteen years old but continued to live a narcissistic life of self-worship, manipulation and arrogance. In 2002, while serving in the U.S. Army overseas in Kuwait, Jason felt God speaking to him and surrendered his life totally. Since then he has received two bachelor degrees in Theology and currently is the Senior Pastor of Church Outside The Familiar Box in Dallas, TX.

From birth Justin aka Just’ Flo was acquainted with pain and struggle having lost his father to cancer as a young child. His mother lived as a practicing homosexual during his childhood years leaving no one to fill the void of a father in his life. Turning to gang activity & drugs were inevitable. By the age of thirteen he became a ward of the state and was placed as a regular resident into a juvenile boot camp in and out of jail until the age of sixteen. After boot camp he turned from gang life only to spiral deeper using and selling drugs and alcohol. At the age of nineteen his girlfriend now wife, took their child to Texas and moved in with Jason’s family hoping for a change. It took being separated from his family for him to stop and hear God tell him if he didn’t change the devil would eventually kill him.

L.E. has rocked various stages from SXSW 2014 to Churches, high schools, convention centers, clubs, and more sharing platforms with many well-known mainstream artists such as Andy Mineo, Bizzle, V-rose, Canon, K-Drama, Da Truth, Eshon Burgundy, Mouthpiece and more. They have also designed their own L.E Clothing Line that helps support their ministry & families. They both serve faithfully in their local congregation as leaders fulfilling their call to win souls for the kingdom of God and make disciples.

For more information on the Living Epistlez;
Supporters should go to www.livinepistlez.com
Join their Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/LivinEpistlez
Follow them at https://twitter.com/livinepistlez
Instagram http://instagram.com/livinepistlez
YouTube https://www.youtube.com/user/livinepistlez

For Interviews please contact Jason Niesing of LE management at: jasonniesing@gmail.com
